bio: A superstar from the future, this premium version of Goldenyan serves to drum up excitement and cheer! OC by @Underscore

soultimate.name: Showstopper
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Increases own Attack by 25%, Defense by 175%, movement speed by 20% and Move Meter speed by 50% for 30 seconds.
soultimate.description: Recover all HP and all stats are greatly increased.

skill.effect: Bigger stat boost the more foes are targeting you.
skill.name: Stars Chip ++

name: Starinyan
